00008 #include "CBridges.h"

00010 #include "../../../CLogFile.h"

00012 unsigned int CBridges::m_bgtile = 0;
00013 
00014 CBridges::CBridges(CMap *pmap, Uint32 x, Uint32 y, Uint32 platx, Uint32 platy):
00015 CObject(pmap, x, y, OBJ_BRIDGE),
00016 m_state(EXTEND),
00017 m_platx(platx),
00018 m_platy(platy),
00019 m_dir(LEFT)
00020 {
00021  timer = 0;
00022  inhibitfall = true;
00023  canbezapped = false;
00024  sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00025 
00026  // if the platform is already extended, turn ourselves
00027  // into an se_retract_plat()
00028  if ( mp_Map->at(m_platx, m_platy) == TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM )
00029  {
00030   // figure out which direction the bridge is supposed to go
00031   //if(platx-1 > m_Objvect.size())
00032    //return;
00033   m_state = RETRACT;
00034   if (mp_Map->at(m_platx-1, m_platy) != TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM)
00035    m_dir = LEFT;
00036   else if(mp_Map->at(m_platx+1, m_platy) != TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM)
00037    m_dir = RIGHT;
00038   else
00039    m_dir = LEFT;
00040 
00041   // scan across until we find the end of the platform--that will
00042   // be where we will start (remove platform in oppisote direction
00043   // it was extended)
00044   do
00045   {
00046    if (mp_Map->at(m_platx, m_platy) != TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM)
00047    { // we've found the end of the platform
00048     break;
00049    }
00050    if (m_dir==LEFT)
00051    {
00052     if (m_platx==mp_Map->m_width)
00053     {
00054      g_pLogFile->ftextOut("SE_RETRACT_PLATFORM: Failed to find end of platform when scanning right.");
00055      return;
00056     }
00057     m_platx++;
00058    }
00059    else
00060    { // platform will be removed in a right-going direction
00061     if (m_platx==0)
00062     {
00063      g_pLogFile->ftextOut("SE_RETRACT_PLATFORM: Failed to find end of platform when scanning left.");
00064      return;
00065     }
00066     m_platx--;
00067    }
00068   } while(1);
00069 
00070   // when we were scanning we went one tile too far, go back one
00071   if (m_dir==LEFT) m_platx--;
00072   else m_platx++;
00073   return;
00074  }
00075 
00076  // figure out which direction the bridge is supposed to go
00077  CTileProperties &TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties(1).at(mp_Map->at(m_platx+1, m_platy));
00078  if (!TileProperties.bleft)
00079   m_dir = RIGHT;
00080  else
00081   m_dir = LEFT;
00082 
00083  // get the background tile from the tile above the starting point
00084  if(m_dir == RIGHT)
00085   m_bgtile = mp_Map->at(m_platx+1, m_platy);
00086  else
00087   m_bgtile = mp_Map->at(m_platx-1, m_platy);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CBridges::process()
00091 {
00092  if(m_state == EXTEND)
00093   extend();
00094  else
00095   retract();
00096 }
00097 
00098 void CBridges::extend()
00099 {
00100 #define PLAT_EXTEND_RATE        3
00101 
00102  std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00103  if (!timer)
00104  {
00105   if (m_dir==RIGHT &&
00106     !TileProperties[mp_Map->at(m_platx, m_platy)].bleft)
00107   {
00108    mp_Map->changeTile(m_platx, m_platy, TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM);
00109    m_platx++;
00110    timer = PLAT_EXTEND_RATE;
00111   }
00112   else if(m_dir==LEFT &&
00113     !TileProperties[mp_Map->at(m_platx, m_platy)].bright)
00114   {
00115    mp_Map->changeTile(m_platx, m_platy, TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM);
00116    m_platx--;
00117    timer = PLAT_EXTEND_RATE;
00118   }
00119   else
00120   {
00121    exists = false;
00122    mp_Map->m_PlatExtending = false;
00123    return;
00124   }
00125  }
00126  else timer--;
00127 }
00128 
00129 void CBridges::retract()
00130 {
00131  if (!timer)
00132  {
00133   if (mp_Map->at(m_platx, m_platy) == TILE_EXTENDING_PLATFORM)
00134   {
00135    mp_Map->setTile(m_platx, m_platy, m_bgtile, true);
00136 
00137    if (m_dir==RIGHT)
00138     m_platx++;
00139    else
00140     m_platx--;
00141 
00142    timer = PLAT_EXTEND_RATE;
00143   }
00144   else
00145   {
00146    exists = false;
00147    mp_Map->m_PlatExtending = false;
00148   }
00149  }
00150  else timer--;
00151 }
